'''Radiant Spincrystal 126''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Tears of Days Past]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on the left of the elevator in {{Location|Domus Aurea: Upper Level}}.
